name: Geartails Mod FNF
description: OK THESE R THE RULES IF YOUR DOWNLOADING THIS! DRAG spooky_kids_assets in your assests folder for fnf, then put it in images or what ever its called then replace it then you should get gear tails, YOU HAVE TO HAVE FNF for this to work lol. Next drag the four audios named south(Voices and inst) and spookez(inst and voices) do the same but instead of images put it in music and then replace. Also Drag the south and spookez.json into the data and drag south into the south data folder and then spookez in the spookeez data folder and then boot up the game if u did it correctly then uh it wont crash lol
